name: Petzl Ange S Carabiner
description: An ultra-light carabiner for climbers looking to reduce weight to a minimum. They're the first wire gates to use a spring mechanism similar to the ones found on standard gates. This type of mechanism lasts twice as long as the usual wire-gate setup, and has smooth gate action that feels similar to the popular Petzl® Spirit.Monofil (single wire) gate offers a hybrid of wire gate and standard gate design.Notchless nose won't catch on stuff.H-shaped profile is thicker on the inside, for durability and smooth rope handling.
